definition-item.definition-title: PROCESSING MEAT, POULTRY, OR FISH (preserving A23B; obtaining protein compositions for foodstuffs A23J1/00; fish, meat or poultry preparations A23L; disintegrating, e.g. chopping meat, B02C18/00; preparation of proteins C07K1/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: Fish, meat or poultry preparations A23L

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus for mixing meat, sausage-meat, or meat products (mixing in general B01F)

section-body.paragraph-text: Meat mixers meant for obtaining a meat mixture for its further processing

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus for pounding, forming, or pressing meat, sausage-meat, or meat products {(meat patty moulding devices for domestic use A47J43/20; ham boilers A47J27/20)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Apparatuses for pressing and moulding meat.
Shaping or working of foodstuffs A23P

table-column.paragraph-text: Meat patty moulding devices for domestic use

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

list-item.paragraph-text: apparatuses for making multi-layered meat products A22C7/0007
for making meat balls A22C7/0015
pressing means A22C7/0023: including containers in which meat is pressed, containers for shaping and boiling ham, stackable containers as well as demoulding means
apparatuses with worms or other rotary mounted members A22C7/0092

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus for tenderising meat, e.g. ham {(tenderising chemically A23L13/00, A23L13/70)}

section-body.paragraph-text: For treating, tenderising or flavouring meat.

table-column.paragraph-text: Tenderised or flavoured meat pieces e.g. by injecting

list-item.paragraph-text: by injection A22C9/001
by electric treatment A22C9/002
by massaging, e.g. with rotating drums or tumblers A22C9/004
by beating A22C9/007
by piercing A22C9/008

definition-item.definition-title: Sausage making {(chemical aspects A23L13/00); Apparatus for handling or conveying sausage products during manufacture}

section-body.paragraph-text: All machinery and processes related to sausage manufacturing

list-item.paragraph-text: Conveying sausages in a horizontal position
Manufacturing sausages with a predetermined shape

definition-item.definition-title: {Machines for making skinless sausages, e.g. Frankfurters, Wieners}

list-item.paragraph-text: removing casings from sausages during manufacture A22C11/003
netting sausages and meat A22C11/005

section-body.paragraph-text: Dividing a continuous strand of sausages into portions

definition-item.definition-title: Sausage filling or stuffing machines {(enclosing material in preformed tubular webs B65B9/10)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Sausage filling or stuffing machines, parts thereof.

list-item.paragraph-text: Stuffing horn assemblies, including devices with multiple interchangeable stuffing horns (e.g. magazine arrangements) A22C11/0209
Supplying casings to the stuffing device A22C11/0227
Controlling devices for the stuffing process: sizing and braking means as well as means for detecting casing depletion
Making sausages with at least one flat end A22C11/0281
Stuffing devices with coating or lubricating means A22C11/029
With a mechanical or hydraulic piston for pushing the stuffing material A22C11/04 and A22C11/06
the stuffing material being pushed by a rotary pressing member A22C11/08

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus for twisting {or linking} sausages {(subdividing filled flexible tubes to form packages, involving displacement of contents B65B9/12, by applying pressure and heat successively B65B51/26)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Subdividing a continuous tubular sausage casing into a strand of linked individual sausages.

table-column.paragraph-text: Subdividing filled tubes by sealing or securing

list-item.paragraph-text: Apparatuses with two rotary members comprising dividing elements which cooperate with each other
Apparatuses dividing the sausage string by means of shear or blade elements, also with displacing movement that creates a narrow point free of meat in the links

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus for tying sausage skins {; Clipping sausage skins (applying clips or binding material to package folds or closures, e.g. to twisted bag necks B65B51/04, B65B51/08)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Apparatuses for tying or clipping the links between individual sausages in a continuous sausage strand

table-column.paragraph-text: Applying clips to close bag necks

list-item.paragraph-text: by means of tying, forming knots
by means of clipping, also including means for the removal of the clips
creating a suspension loop

definition-item.definition-title: Sausage casings {(made of animal intestines A22C17/14)}

list-item.paragraph-text: apparatus for making sausage casings
chemical composition of sausage casings
Chemical treatment of natural gut
Shirring of sausage casings

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for treating the surfaces of sheets, webs, etc. in connection with printing

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {nets and similar open structures to hold sausages and meat in general}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Filling sausage products into sleeve netting
Making nets by knotting of filamentary material

definition-item.definition-title: {printable sausage casings or sausage casings showing any kind of indicia}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus for hanging-up meat or sausages {(filling and conveying sausage products during manufacture A22C11/00; transport through slaughterhouses A22B7/001; poultry shackles A22C21/0007; conveying poultry A22C21/0053)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Means for hanging-up meat or sausages for transportation or for storage
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for transferring articles between conveyors

list-item.paragraph-text: Adapted for hanging or conveying several sausages or strips of meat (e.g. for suspending sausages from a stick) A22C15/001
Hooks for meat or hams (e.g. with hooks or cords penetrating the piece of meat, bacon hangers) A22C15/003
Racks for storing or smoking suspended meat A22C15/007
Cages for suspending hams, meat or sausages A22C15/008

definition-item.definition-title: Other devices for processing meat or bones

table-column.paragraph-text: Cleaning the stomach of slaughtered animals
Packaging specially shaped pieces of meat
Packaging slices of meat, poultry or fish

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Collecting or arranging articles in groups

list-item.paragraph-text: Cutting or shaping meat A22C17/0006
Deboning meat A22C17/004
Processing meat by injection A22C17/0053
Putting meat on skewers A22C17/006
Using visual recognition, X-rays, ultrasounds, or other contactless means to determine quality or size of a potion of meat A22C17/0073
Handling, transporting or packaging, pieces of meat A22C17/0093
Holding meat or bones during cutting A22C17/02
Bone cleaning devices, separating meat from bone A22C17/04
Bone shears, bone crushers, bone milling machines A22C17/06
Cleaning, washing meat or sausages A22C17/08
Marking meat or sausages A22C17/10
Apparatus for cutting off rind, removing fat from meat cuts A22C17/12
Working-up of animal intestines, apparatus for cutting intestines or pulling intestines to pieces. Sausage casings made of animal intestines A22C17/14
Cleaning intestines, removing fat or slime from intestines A22C17/16

definition-item.definition-title: Plants, factories, or the like for processing meat (for processing poultry only A22C21/00; for processing fish only A22C25/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: Complete integral processes for processing meat and plants for their implementation
All types of machinery and operations performed specifically on poultry:
Class A22C21/0015 is redundant with class A22B3/086. Both classes are envisaged to merge together.

list-item.paragraph-text: poultry shackles for holding and suspending poultry while it is conveyed along the process line of a slaughterhouse A22C21/0007
Killing poultry entering the processing machine: slaughtering devices integrated in the processing line, which are part of a continuous process A22C21/0015
Cutting and dividing operations on poultry A22C21/0023, filleting, extracting, cutting or shaping poultry fillets A22C21/003
Trussing poultry A22C21/0038, making poultry keep its shape for being further processed (e.g. for being cooked evenly)
Support devices for poultry A22C21/0046
Transferring or conveying devices for poultry A22C21/0053
Cleaning or disinfecting poultry A22C21/0061
Deboning poultry A22C21/0069
Skinning poultry A22C21/0092 - Plucking mechanisms for poultry A22C21/02, defeathering poultry
Scalding, singeing, waxing, or dewaxing poultry A22C21/04
Eviscerating poultry A22C21/06: Hand tools, removing tendons

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: tying and/or restraining a poultry carcass with twine, cord or other elements so that it can be further processed (e.g. in order to facilitate packaging or enable even cooking)
pulling the feathers from a bird's carcass

definition-item.definition-title: Processing fish {; Curing of fish; Stunning of fish by electric current; Investigating fish by optical means (slaughtering fish A22B3/08)}

section-body.paragraph-text: All types of machinery and operation performed specifically on fish, also processing cephalopods (octopus, squid, cuttlefish...):
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Classes A22C25/14 and A22C25/14 may result redundant. It is envisaged to merge them both.

list-item.paragraph-text: Beheading, cleaning and eviscerating fish combined with removing fishbones, skinning and filleting A22C25/14 . Hand tools therefor
Washing or descaling fish A22C25/02. Hand tools therefor A22C25/025
Sorting fish A22C25/04. Grading fish, separating fish from ice.
Work tables, fish holding devices A22C25/06, supports for working on fish
Conveying fish. Holding and guiding fish while being conveyed A22C25/08. Adapting conveyors to the size of fish.
Threading fish on strings A22C25/10
Arranging fish according to the position of head and tail A22C25/12
Beheading, eviscerating, or cleaning fish A22C25/14. Not in combination with skinning, deboning or filleting. Also including evisceration by means of suction and extracting roe from fish
Removing fish bones, filleting fish A22C25/16, removing fins A22C25/163, removing pinbones from fish fillets.
Skinning fish A22C25/17
Cutting fish into portions A22C25/18. Hand tools therefor A22C25/185
Shredding, cutting fish into cubes, flaking A22C25/20, obtaining fish pulp.
Fish rolling apparatus A22C25/22

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: the mass of eggs contained in the ovaries of a female fish or shellfish, especially when ripe and used as food

definition-item.definition-title: Processing shellfish {or bivalves}, e.g. oysters, lobsters; {Devices therefor, e.g. claw locks, claw crushers, grading devices; Processing lines}

section-body.paragraph-text: Processing shellfish, bivalves, hard-shelled molluscs and crustaceans

list-item.paragraph-text: Processing crustaceans A22C29/02, grading, beheading, conveying, deveining shrimps and prawns, shelling and peeling crustaceans. Hand tools therefor A22C29/027 .
Processing molluscs A22C29/02, grading, cleaning, shucking, and/or opening hard-shelled molluscs, whether bivalve or not.
